title: Dear all, I am still fairly satisfied with the Pixel 3, but battery wise, not really. Any thoughts?
content:
My phone is 2 months old. Being performing great, although I am thinking that battery wise, not so good. But the reason to make this post and ask you guys a straight forward question:

Leaving the phone on airplane mode during the night and finding it with less 8% battery is normal? I mean, almost every function should be off, so. That's about 1% each hour which looks like a lot!

Thank you for the help!
